description: This source file defines a Jetpack Compose UI screen called `RecipeDetailScreen` which displays the details of a recipe, including image, ingredients, and instructions. It uses Compose components like Scaffold, TopAppBar, AsyncImage, and Text, and references the data class `Recipe`.
